channel.title: Rage-Scape 732 - Economy - Grand Exchange - 15+ Minigames - Unique Content
channel.description:
Website: www.Rage-Scape.com
Questions? Feel free to pm me or skype me: cpaxe97
Minigames: Fight Caves Fight Kiln Dominion Tower (All 5 Modes) Crucible Clan Wars (Safe/Dangerous/Clan) Sorceress' Garden Pest Control Runespan (Almost Done - Few More Days) Stealing Creations - 70% Castle Wars Puro Puro Barrows Duel Arena Zombies Brimhaven Agility Arena
Combat: All combat skills add up to 138. All spells in all 3 magic books work. Normal prayers and ancient curses work. Majority of Specials work. Quick prayers function properly. Ranged and magic work from distances. 3 items kelt on death. Grim Reaper's office on death. All item's have bonuses. Combat differences in the wildy. Majority of item's have their working effects. Rapid switching and correct following. Working Kill/Death Ratio. Random Pvp drops. Gravestones upon death. You have been killed by xxx.
Full Dungeons/Lairs: Taverly Dungeon Brimhaven Dungeon Fremmenik Slayer Dungeon Slayer Tower Revant Cave Edgeville Dungeon Living Rock Cavern Glacors Cave Jadinko Lair Frost Dragon Lair Ancient Caverns Elite Knight Lair Ice Cave Corporeal Beast Lair Queen Black Dragon Lair King Black Dragon Lair TzHaar/Karamja Cave Lava Maze Dungeon Godwar Dungeon Kalphite Lair Skytrworm Lairs (for all 4 types) Polypore Dungeon Lumbridge Swamp Smoke Dungeon Chaos Tunnels Desert Slayer Dungeon Chaos Dwogre Battle Field
Quests: Nomad's Requiem While Guthux Sleeps
Random Events: Trivia Geni Lamp Rock Golem Sandwich Lady
Other: Squeal of Fortune Dicing with clan rolls. Pets, summoning and extra. Working emotes. 100% Friends chat with lootshare. Working loyalty auras. Sexy panel in the quest tab. Customizable skillcapes. Teleporting all over the world with complete cities. Grand Exchange. Money Pouch Sexy Interfaces Working clans. Working money pouch. Prestiging system. Ability to change your home out of 5 locations. Loads more!
Images: [img]http://i.imgur.com/JMlm6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vu3vN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MM8Ym.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dp01E.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EjsXS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NPiam.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rnbI1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/F0cLH.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XXn69.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lBVkb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ia5a0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iyKpB.png[/img]
